reviewText: Great collection of episodes. "Musical Instruments of Destruction" made me laugh hysterically.

I'll keep it short and sweet: This item does better with early collectors or pseudo-newbies who know the characters and overall schematics of Ranma 1/2. Hardcore fans will collect it for the sake of completeness, or at least I recommend it for that. It's not altogether an excellent addition to Ranma 1/2, but it's still worth the watch.
